import React, { useState } from 'react' import './Navbar.css' import logo from '../assets/logo.png' import cart_icon from '../assets/cart_icon.png' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' const Navbar = () => { const {all_product,cartitem,removefromcart,getTotalCartAmount}=useContext(ShopContext); const [menu,setMenu] =useState("shop"); return (

SHOPPER

  • {setMenu("shop")}}> Shop {menu==="shop"?
    :<>}
  • {setMenu("Men")}}>Men {menu==="Men"?
    :<>}
  • {setMenu("Women")}}>Women {menu==="Women"?
    :<>}
  • {setMenu("Kids")}}> Kids {menu==="Kids"?
    :<>}
{getTotalCartItems()}
) } export default Navbar
